title: Why isn\'t there a left turn arrow on New Centre Drive at the Racine Avenue intersection?
text:
Because the infrastructure wasn't there to support it. Now, with the
heavy amount of traffic through the area,  it's one area being looked
at. We always suggest that readers who point out traffic concerns
contact the city's traffic engineering department:
http://www.wilmingtonnc.gov/traffic/tabid/117/Default.aspx

The more people who write or call about issues, the quicker they will
be fixed.
